Description:
Verify that bookmarks are properly deleted from bookmarks file and
      disappear from all access points.

Verify that double-clicking on a bookmark causes it to be launched in
      a browser window
Verify folder(s) are correctly deleted.
Verify that disclosure triangles/folder icons are in sync.
Verify separators are properly added/deleted.
sort and reverse-sort per column
Verify that several bookmarks are deleted at one time.

Currently, it is my understanding that there will be no new features
      in this area

Determine whether text copied from a formatted web page (such as
      within a table) has a "non-annoying" layout.

Confirm that dragging a link across browser windows
      opens the link.

Feature: D&D from the destkop â€“ Invalid Items
Description:
Confirm that invalid items dragged to the
      browser window are handled properly

Feature: D&D URL Proxy Icons onto the Desktop
Description:
Verify that dragging the URL proxy icon
      onto the desktop creates a shortcut

Determine if the Bookmark Manager properly handles
      items dragged onto it.

Feature:
D&D <a href="/drag-url-browser-toolbar/">
      Given link is non-fetchable, non-retrievable Personal Toolbar
Description: Determine if you can drag items to and from the Personal Toolbar

113893Implement New Form Functionality
      (waiting on bug status)

* Longer range:
      there is discussion about introducing Internet permission zones.
      Some of the settings shown here may be controlled by such zones
      (Waiting for Implementation)

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on
      the form itself.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Verify that it is possible to install only the needed help files
        (for components that are actually installed)

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a section for an Upgrade
        Guide.

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays
        correctly

Determine whether Creating web pages help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether What's new in Netscape 6 displays correctly
Determine whether Same time messaging displays correctly
sort and reverse-sort per column
Don't ever show 302 redirects in history
Verify correct recently visited sites are in go menu.

Verify that a new session is started with a new browser window or a
        restart.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.

Determine whether displaying animated GIFs result in single server
        request for the image, rather than additional requests upon each frame
        change.

Determine whether X Bitmap (XBM) format images can be displayed.Note: XBM will not be supported in the initial 5.0
          release.

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Feature: Save username and password, never for this site
Description:
Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when you have saved multiple username's and password's
      for a website, you are later presented with those same choices

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      preferences

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (espn.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)

Verify that when you have saved a username and password in password
      manager, this information can be viewed in the password manager through
      tasks

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through tasks (nbci.com)

Verify that you can remove a site and username from the passwords
      never saved section of password manager
Determine if a page with indentations prints as seen on screen
Determine if CSS pages print properly
Determine if  large page print properly
Determine if lists print correctly
Determine id Page Setup dialog works correctly
Determine that off-line printing works
Determine if quicktime movies play properly
Determine if windows media player works fine
Determine whether the triple-click gesture functions properly.
Determine whether drag-scrolling gestures function properly.
Check default width of Sidebar
Retaining non-default size on reopen or new window
Verify list of available remote panels
Verify that links in Bookmarks work

Verify that unselecting panels from Add menu removes panels from
        the Sidebar
Tests to access this dialog from the menubar and keyboard.

Open web location in a Composer window. Includes test to dismiss
        dialog.
Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Use of the XUL file picker on Linux to navigate through 
        directories and open files (html, plaintext, image). Resizing,
        selection/scrolling, cancellation also tested. Test last
        directory-viewed.

Feature: Basic access of Find and Find Again
Description: Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Find forwards and backwards within a document. Test Find
        Again.
Attempt to find strings within an input textfield.
View source of plaintext, xml page, ftp listing.

Scrolling and keyboard navigation within the source window. Also
        should be able to use keyboard accelerators. Resize source window.
View info for a webpage, frame and frameset.
Verify Classic theme works as advertised
Verify Modern theme works as advertised

Description:
Click through all the items on menu bar, tool bars, and floating

Grab any corner of window and drag to resize. Only bottom-right
